amendment.description: Page 1163, beginning line 23, strike ``such'' and all that follows through ``That'' on line 8 of page 1164. Page 1164, beginning line 16, strike the colon and all that follows before the period at the end of line 24.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to ensure greater flexibility for state departments of transportation to make targeted recissions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Woodall.
